title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.97 - Single-service articles; when required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.97 - Single-service articles; when required

State Regulations

Single-service articles are to be furnished to consumers at all food service establishments which do not have effective facilities for cleaning and sanitizing tableware. Single-service articles are to be discarded after one use. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-1.97

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
